name: Demon of Eden
description:
USE HEADPHONES OR TURN UP YOUR VOLUME

The sleepy town of Eden is in danger. Find out why the townsfolk are disappearing and stop the evil that is plaguing this town.

How to play:

  • WASD to move.
  • Left click to interact with people and objects
  • 'F' to turn on your flashlight
  • 'M' to open your map
